text: Jair Braga (3 June 1954 - 8 May 2004)Jair Braga was a Brazilian cyclist. He competed in the team time trial event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Brazilian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Brazil Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Jair Braga
